description: Wedges of sweet and juicy nectarines and peaches on a bed of crispy baby cos lettuce make this summery chicken salad sing.
name: Nectarine, Peach, Chicken & Baby Cos Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 yellow nectarines, halved, destoned, cut into wedges
2 yellow peaches, halved, destoned, cut into wedges
0.33 cup hazelnut kernels, toasted, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place orange juice, oil and curry powder in a screw-top jar. Season, then secure lid and shake until well combined.
Place chicken, nectarine, peach, hazelnuts, rocket and lettuce in a large bowl and toss to combine. Divide among plates, drizzle with dressing and serve with wholegrain sourdough.
